author: Moobeat (noreply@blogger.com)
title: 1/4 PBE Update
text:
[ NEWS :  Snowdown ending soon . ]


[This is a  W ORK  I N  P ROGRESS POST .] [ Status : The PBE is back up and online.]

Small update pushed to PBE as we continue the 7.1 PBE cycle!

Continue reading for more information!

( Warning : PBE Content is tentative and subject to change - what you see below may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers at the end of the cycle! Manage your expectations accordingly.) 

Table of Contents Additional 2017 Team Icons Balance Changes Notes 
Additional 2017 Team Icons [More icons added - at about 90 for the full cycle so far]

New 
CBLOL : Remo Brave eSports, CNB e-Sports Cub, Keyd Stars, [?], KaBuM! IDM, paiN Gaming, Operation Kino 

LCL : Gambit Gaming, Virtus.Pro, Vaevictus Esports, [?]



LCK : Kongdoo Monster

Updated LCK : [?] 

LCL : [?], Vega Squadron, Natus Vincere.CIS, TORNADO ROX 

Balance Changes *  Remember  *: The PBE is a testing grounds for new, tentative, and sometimes radical or experimental changes. Be aware that what you see below may be lacking context or other changes that didn't make it in or were implemented in an earlier patch this cycle! These are  not  official notes.

[None today by looks of it. Need to confirm!] 

Notes KateyKhaos has posted on the boards regarding a clarity pass for Elementalist Lux's visual effects that is on the PBE and will be going out in 7.1 - including examples!  

Check out  [ THIS PAGE ]  for a  comprehensive list of the new content & changes currently on the PBE as a part of this cycle  or catch up with the individual update links below !
12/6 PBE Update: Dreadnova Gangplank, Warring Kingdoms Azir, Garen, & Vi skins, Heartseeker Lucian & Quinn, and more! 12/7 PBE Update: Skin tweaks & tentative balance changes. 12/8 PBE Update: WK Azir and Heartseeker Quinn Skin Tweaks 12/9 PBE Update: Lunar Revel Hextech Assets, WK Vi tweaks, tentative balance changes, and more! 12/12 PBE Update: 2017 Esports team icons, Ascension back on PBE for RGMQ testing, WK Vi tweaks, and more! 12/13 PBE Update: Valentine's Day icons, Kalista changes, & more!  12/14 PBE Update: WK Vi tweaks 12/15 PBE Update: More Esports Icons, WK Vi , & LCU Updates! 12/16 PBE Update: Lunar Revel 2017 Login, Esports Emotes, and more! 1/3 PBE Update: New Skin splash arts, HS Quinn changes, & more!
